overview.title: Complete Smile Restoration
overview.description: Full mouth rehabilitation, also known as full mouth reconstruction, is a comprehensive dental treatment plan that aims to restore the health, function, and appearance of all teeth in the mouth.

doctor.name: Dr. Anita S. Yadao
doctor.title: Head of Restorative Dentistry
doctor.message: Our goal with full mouth rehabilitation is to not only restore your smile's beauty but also its complete function. We use a personalized approach, combining artistry with advanced dental science to achieve life-changing results.
doctor.info: Dr. Anita S. Yadao specializes in complex dental reconstructions. Her expertise in endodontics and cosmetic dentistry makes her a leading professional in full mouth rehabilitation, ensuring every patient receives comprehensive care for a healthy, functional, and beautiful smile.

team.description: Our rehabilitation team consists of prosthodontists, oral surgeons, and cosmetic dentists working together to create a seamless treatment experience.

treatments.name: Comprehensive Oral Examination
treatments.description: A detailed assessment of your teeth, gums, and jaw structure using 3D imaging and digital scans.

treatments.name: Restorative Procedures
treatments.description: Includes crowns, bridges, veneers, and implants to repair or replace damaged or missing teeth.

treatments.name: Bite Alignment and Adjustment
treatments.description: Correcting the bite (occlusion) to ensure comfort, prevent wear, and improve jaw function.

technologies.name: 3D CBCT Imaging
technologies.description: Cone Beam Computed Tomography for precise 3D views of your jawbone, teeth, and facial structures.

technologies.name: Intraoral Digital Scanners
technologies.description: Creates highly accurate 3D models of your teeth, eliminating the need for messy traditional impressions.

technologies.name: CAD/CAM Technology
technologies.description: Computer-Aided Design and Manufacturing for creating custom crowns, bridges, and veneers with perfect fit and aesthetics.

testimonials.name: Sunita Patil
testimonials.quote: I never thought I could smile with confidence again. The team at Ujwal Dental Clinic gave me a new lease on life. The entire process was handled with such professionalism and care.

testimonials.name: Ravi Desai
testimonials.quote: The results are beyond my expectations. My teeth feel strong, and my smile looks natural. The technology they use is truly top-notch.

overview.title: Painless Root Canal Therapy
overview.description: A root canal is a dental procedure that treats an infected or damaged tooth by removing the infected pulp, cleaning and shaping the inside of the tooth, and then filling and sealing the space.

doctor.name: Dr. Anita S. Yadao
doctor.title: Lead Endodontist
doctor.message: Our primary focus is to save your natural teeth. With modern root canal therapy, we can alleviate your pain and preserve your tooth for years to come, often in a single, comfortable visit.
doctor.info: As a specialist in Endodontics, Dr. Anita S. Yadao is an expert in diagnosing and treating tooth pain. She utilizes advanced techniques like microscopic endodontics to ensure the highest precision and success rates for all root canal treatments.

team.description: Our endodontic team is comprised of specialists who focus exclusively on treatments of the dental pulp, ensuring you receive expert care.

treatments.name: Diagnosis and X-Ray
treatments.description: Using digital RVG X-rays to accurately diagnose the extent of the infection and plan the treatment.

treatments.name: Pulp Removal and Cleaning
treatments.description: Gentle removal of the infected pulp, followed by meticulous cleaning and shaping of the root canals.

treatments.name: Filling and Sealing
treatments.description: The cleaned canals are filled with a biocompatible material and sealed to prevent re-infection, followed by a crown for protection.

technologies.name: Dental Microscope
technologies.description: Provides high magnification and illumination for precise and thorough cleaning of root canals.

technologies.name: Rotary Endodontics
technologies.description: Flexible, nickel-titanium files that clean and shape the canals more efficiently and quietly than traditional methods.

technologies.name: Apex Locators
technologies.description: Electronic devices used to determine the precise length of the root canal, ensuring a complete and accurate cleaning.

testimonials.name: Amit Singh
testimonials.quote: I was terrified of getting a root canal, but Dr. Anita and her team made it a completely painless and comfortable experience. I'm so grateful they saved my tooth!

testimonials.name: Priya Mehta
testimonials.quote: The single-visit root canal was so convenient. The technology they use is impressive, and the staff is incredibly professional. Highly recommend.

overview.title: Permanent Solution for Missing Teeth
overview.description: A dental implant is a titanium screw that replaces a missing tooth's root. The surgeon inserts the implant into the jawbone, where it acts as a permanent anchor for a natural-looking artificial tooth (crown).

doctor.name: Dr. Mangesh Andhare
doctor.title: Lead Implantologist
doctor.message: Dental implants are the gold standard for replacing missing teeth. They restore not just your smile, but your confidence and ability to eat comfortably. We use the latest guided surgery techniques for predictable, long-lasting results.
doctor.info: Dr. Mangesh Andhare is a specialist in oral implantology, focusing on the surgical placement of dental implants and bone grafting procedures. His meticulous approach ensures optimal integration and longevity of the implants, providing patients with a durable and aesthetic solution for missing teeth.

team.description: Our implantology team includes experienced oral surgeons and prosthodontists who collaborate to ensure both the surgical and restorative phases of your treatment are seamless.

treatments.name: Implant Placement Surgery
treatments.description: A minor surgical procedure to place the titanium implant into the jawbone under local anesthesia.

treatments.name: Bone Grafting
treatments.description: A procedure to build up the jawbone when there is insufficient bone to support an implant.

treatments.name: Crown Restoration
treatments.description: After the implant has integrated with the bone, a custom-made, natural-looking crown is attached to the implant.

technologies.name: Computer-Guided Implant Surgery
technologies.description: Uses 3D imaging to plan the precise placement of the implant, increasing safety and accuracy.

technologies.name: 3D CBCT Scanner
technologies.description: Provides detailed 3D images of the jawbone, essential for planning implant surgery.

technologies.name: Piezosurgery
technologies.description: Ultrasonic technology for precise and gentle bone surgery, minimizing trauma to surrounding tissues.

testimonials.name: Vikram Rathod
testimonials.quote: The implant feels just like my own tooth. I can eat anything I want without worry. The entire process at Ujwal Dental was smooth and professional.

testimonials.name: Anjali Verma
testimonials.quote: I was missing several teeth, and it affected my confidence. Dr. Andhare and his team did an amazing job. My new smile looks and feels completely natural.

overview.title: Design Your Perfect Smile
overview.description: Cosmetic dentistry focuses on improving the appearance of your teeth, gums, and smile. It includes a range of treatments from teeth whitening and veneers to complete smile makeovers.

doctor.name: Dr. Anita S. Yadao
doctor.title: Cosmetic Dentistry Expert
doctor.message: A beautiful smile is a powerful asset. We combine artistry with the latest dental techniques to craft smiles that are not only beautiful but also healthy and natural-looking. Let us help you achieve the smile of your dreams.
doctor.info: Dr. Anita S. Yadao has a keen eye for aesthetics and a passion for creating beautiful smiles. She specializes in a range of cosmetic procedures, including veneers, teeth whitening, and digital smile design, to provide personalized results that enhance her patients' confidence.

team.description: Our cosmetic dentistry team is dedicated to the art and science of smile enhancement, ensuring every detail is perfect.

treatments.name: Porcelain Veneers
treatments.description: Thin, custom-made shells of tooth-colored material designed to cover the front surface of teeth to improve their appearance.

treatments.name: Teeth Whitening (Bleaching)
treatments.description: A safe and effective procedure to lighten the color of your teeth and remove stains and discoloration.

treatments.name: Digital Smile Design (DSD)
treatments.description: A modern approach where you can preview your new smile on a screen before any treatment begins, ensuring predictable and satisfying results.

technologies.name: Digital Smile Design Software
technologies.description: Advanced software to analyze facial and dental structures to create a smile that is in harmony with your features.

technologies.name: Laser Dentistry
technologies.description: Used for gum contouring and other soft tissue procedures to create a more aesthetic gum line with minimal discomfort.

technologies.name: High-Quality Ceramics
technologies.description: We use top-grade porcelain and ceramic materials that mimic the translucency and strength of natural teeth.

testimonials.name: Neha Sharma
testimonials.quote: The veneers have completely transformed my smile. I can't stop looking in the mirror! The process was so detailed, and the result is perfect.

testimonials.name: Rohan Kapoor
testimonials.quote: Quick, easy, and the results were amazing. My teeth are several shades whiter. The team at Ujwal Dental Clinic was fantastic.

overview.title: Precision Crowns & Bridges
overview.description: Custom-fitted crowns and bridges to restore damaged or missing teeth, improving function and aesthetics.

doctor.name: Dr. Jitendra Shinde
doctor.title: Prosthodontist
doctor.message: Our crowns and bridges are crafted for durability and a natural look, seamlessly blending with your smile.
doctor.info: Dr. Shinde specializes in prosthetic restorations using the latest materials and techniques to ensure optimal fit and function.

team.description: Our prosthodontic team collaborates to deliver precise and long-lasting restorations.

treatments.name: Crown Fabrication & Fitting
treatments.description: Custom fabrication and precise fitting of high-quality crowns to restore tooth structure and appearance.

technologies.name: Digital CAD/CAM Imaging
technologies.description: Computer-aided design and manufacturing for precisely milled crowns and bridges.

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.quote: The crowns fit perfectly and look so natural! I couldn’t be happier with the results.

overview.title: Advanced Oral Surgery
overview.description: Surgical procedures to treat complex facial, jaw, and oral conditions.

doctor.name: Dr. Adinath Jadhao
doctor.title: Maxillofacial Surgeon
doctor.message: Our surgeons are skilled in the latest techniques to ensure safe and effective outcomes.
doctor.info: Dr. Jadhao leads our surgical team, offering expert care for trauma and reconstructive cases.

team.description: Dedicated surgical staff ensuring patient safety and comfort.

treatments.name: Complex Oral Surgery
treatments.description: Surgical treatment of facial trauma and jaw disorders with advanced techniques.

technologies.name: 3D Guided Surgery
technologies.description: 3D planning and surgical guides for precise implant and reconstructive procedures.

testimonials.name: Ashok Mehta
testimonials.quote: I felt safe and well-informed throughout my surgery. Recovery was smooth and quick.

overview.title: Periodontal Surgery & Grafting
overview.description: Repair and regenerate bone and gum tissue damaged by advanced gum disease.

doctor.name: Dr. Mangesh Andhare
doctor.title: Periodontist
doctor.message: Our bone grafting procedures restore bone structure, providing a stable foundation for dental implants.
doctor.info: Dr. Andhare specializes in periodontal regeneration techniques for optimal healing and function.

team.description: Our periodontal experts work together to treat and manage gum disease effectively.

treatments.name: Bone Grafting
treatments.description: Augmentation of jawbone using graft material to support dental implants.

technologies.name: Piezosurgery
technologies.description: Ultrasonic bone cutting tool for minimally invasive graft procedures.

testimonials.name: Sunil Deshpande
testimonials.quote: The bone graft gave me the confidence to get implants. The team was professional and caring.

overview.title: Impacted Tooth Removal

doctor.name: Dr. Adinath Jadhao
doctor.title: Oral Surgeon
doctor.message: Expert surgical management of impacted teeth ensures minimal trauma and quick recovery.
doctor.info: Dr. Jadhao has extensive experience in complex extractions and cyst management.

team.description: Skilled surgical assistants ensuring safe tooth removal procedures.

treatments.name: Impacted Tooth Extraction
treatments.description: Gentle surgical removal of impacted teeth ensuring minimal discomfort.

technologies.name: Intraoral Camera Imaging
technologies.description: High-definition imaging to plan precise extractions and monitor healing.

testimonials.name: Geeta Patel
testimonials.quote: The extraction was quick and painless. I was back to normal activities the next day.

doctor.info: Dr. Agrawal is board-certified in orthodontics and dentofacial orthopedics.

team.description: Our orthodontic specialists ensure precise tooth movement and bite correction.

treatments.name: Clear Aligner Therapy

technologies.name: 3D Smile Simulation
technologies.description: Digital preview of treatment outcome before starting orthodontic therapy.

doctor.info: Dr. Yadao expertly prepares and places posts to support long-term restorations.

team.description: Endodontic team ensuring precise post placement.

treatments.name: Post & Core Placement
